## isDraftOf() function

Check whether a particular document ID is the draft ID of another document ID

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isDraftOf(
  id: DocumentId,
  candidate: DocumentId,
): candidate is DraftId
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

[DocumentId](./id-utils.documentid.md)


</td><td>

The document ID to check if the candidate is a draft of


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

candidate


</td><td>

[DocumentId](./id-utils.documentid.md)


</td><td>

The candidate document ID to check Note: returns true for identical draft ids, i.e. isDraftOf(DraftId('drafts.foo'), DraftId('drafts.foo')) will be true.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

candidate is [DraftId](./id-utils.draftid.md)
